title: You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again
body:
Hi , i got You have disconnected error randomly when i start a game champion select proceeds without any problems game starts, and my client fails to connect, says You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again [Error Picture](https://s13.postimg.io/7j3zwzk9z/Untitled.png)
i have made every thing at [TROUBLESHOOTING CONNECTION ISSUES ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and use Hextech Repair Tool and repatch the game but i still got the same error any help ?

replies.body: Losing connection in champion select does sounds like a network issue that our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) can help resolve.  If you are still having issues, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  The HRT should have also provided some logs, which you can attach to the ticket for context.  We will respond as soon as we can!
